p:
This is the so-called containment phase in response to the COVID-19 3 epidemic, which aims to save lives by:
•
slowing the transmission of the virus by reducing the number of new infections;
•
increasing screening capacity to test all symptomatic individuals and their families;
•
ensuring that the health care system has the capacity to best treat COVID-19 patients while maintaining continuity of care for other conditions, without risk of transmission of the virus.
